mapper.insert: insert into ${church}.auth_group (auth_set_idx, sort_no, auth_type_idx, value, reg_date) values (#{authSetIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authTypeIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ${church}.auth_group
auth_set_idx,
sort_no,
auth_type_idx,
value,
reg_date,
#{authSetIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{authTypeIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{value,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

insert into ${church}.auth_group (auth_set_idx, sort_no, auth_type_idx, value) select c.auth_set_idx, b.sort_no, b.auth_type_idx, b.value from ${church}.auth_set a inner join ${church}.auth_group b on a.auth_set_idx=b.auth_set_idx inner join ${church}.auth_set c on a.auth_category_idx=c.auth_category_idx and a.auth_set_kind=c.auth_set_kind and c.group_no is null and c.year=#{nextYear} where a.year=#{year} and a.group_no is null
mapper.delete: delete a from ${church}.auth_group a inner join ${church}.auth_set b on a.auth_set_idx=b.auth_set_idx where b.year=#{nextYear} and b.k_part=0 and b.group_no is null
